FuncDef: This command sets or clears/resets the read-only attribute for a file in the local file system. To list all files and their current attributes enterattriborattrib xwherexis either the filename or a wildcard (*).

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the URL for the local file. Values-file url|local-url | remote-url: 255 chars max, local-url|[cflash-id/][file-path] 200 chars max, including cflash-id directory length 99 chars max each, , remote-url |[{ftp:// | tftp://}login:pswd@remote-locn/][file-path], |247 chars max, |directory length 99 chars max each, remote-locn |[hostname | ipv4-address | [ipv6-address]], ipv4-address |a.b.c.d, ipv6-address |x:x:x:x:x:x:x:x[-interface], |x:x:x:x:x:x:d.d.d.d[-interface], |x - [0 to FFFF]H, |d - [0 to 255]D, |interface - 32 chars max, for link local addresses 255 , cflash-id |cf1:, cf1-A:, cf1-B:, cf2:, cf2-A:, cf2-B:, cf3:, cf3-A:, cf3-B:.
Sets the read-only attribute on the specified file.
Clears/resets the read-only attribute on the specified file.
